descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Everdream Valley VR – Escape to a Wholesome World in VR 🐐

Take a break from the real world and head to your grandparents' magical farm.
Trade stress for soil and deadlines for ducklings in this cozy VR adventure full of animals, farming, cooking, and a sprinkle of dreamlike magic.

# Become a Real VR Farmer 🌱

Get your hands dirty (without actually getting dirty).
Plant, water, weed, harvest - everything is fully interactive with your own hands. Grab, toss, splash, stroke. It’s farming like you’ve never felt before.

[media]

# The Animals Are Many. The Drama Is Real🐶

Take care of cows, pigs, ducks, alpacas, goats, bees, sheep and… a few more “surprises.”
Each creature has its own behavior and brings life to your valley. Be warned: chickens may be plotting something.

[media]

# Explore a Magical, Mysterious World🐾

Everdream Valley is more than just a farm.
Pitch tents under the stars, build treehouses, dig for treasure, explore hidden corners, and uncover strange secrets. Your valley is alive with stories, side quests, and surprises.
[media]

# Everdream Valley VR 🧡

**A cozy VR experience where nostalgia meets nature – and goats play soccer.
It’s your childhood summer break, reimagined for virtual reality. And no one will stop you from launching a chicken onto the roof.**
